# useRoomContext

Ensures that a room is provided via context. If no room is provided, an error is thrown.

## Import

```typescript
import { useRoomContext } from "@livekit/components-react";
```

{% partial file="p_usage.md" variables={exampleCount: 0} /%}

## Returns

```typescript
Room;
```
